Steps:
1.Open the browser and enter the url:https://www.bigbasket.com/
2.Select the category "Beverages" in dropdown "shop by category" 
3.Select the sub menu "Tea & Coffee".
4.Select the option "Ground Coffee".
5.Select the option "Coffee - Special Gold" and click on Add button
6. Verify whether the selected product is added in "Add to cart"
